DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess Efficacy Safety Teriparatide Japanese Postmenopausal Women Osteoporosis .
DOC.criteria: Japanese woman primary osteoporosis Postmenopausal woman age least 55 year Patients high risk fracture History metabolic bone disorder osteoporosis History secondary cause osteoporosis History malignant neoplasm within last 5 year except superficial basal cell carcinoma squamous cell carcinoma skin definitively treat Severe chronically disable condition osteoporosis
